body: Staff, the innocent people of Avicus are experience spawn killing when they join the server, and must rush to type /hub when they join. I was hoping one of the Administrators/Sr. Mods can prevent this from happening. For further notice, keep in touch with on the server itself, or here, on the forums.
body_tagged: Staff, the innocent people of Avicus are experience spawn killing when they join the server, and must rush to type /hub when they join. I was hoping one of the Administrators/Sr. Mods can prevent this from happening. For further notice, keep in touch with on the server itself, or here, on the forums.
title: Staff Help

replies.body:
Well, those users who are spawnkilling should be reported since they're breaking a rule.
If you do so, a mod will come to your match and decide an appropiate punishment for the situation.
All you need to do is /report (Player) - (Reason)
Cheers :^)

replies.body:
Thanks, I never thought of that ;)

 xD I'm so stupid
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Thanks for this, but /report is the perfect solution for this; as Juanoh stated above.

If no staff is currently online, you can record the spawn killer and file an online report.

Thanks for your concern!
